Key Match Events: Argentina scored early with a goal by Julián Álvarez in the 22nd minute
Lionel Messi scored the second goal for Argentina in the 51st minute
The match ended with a 2-0 scoreline in favor of Argentina
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey, with an attendance of 80,102
Others: The match was part of the 2024 Copa América tournament
